structure.unit: A AUTOMATED MOTOR VEHICLE REGISTRATION SYSTEM

law.catch_line: Processing prohibited when property tax account delinquent, exception.
law.text: A county clerk shall not process an application for Kentucky title and registration from or to any Kentucky resident who has a delinquent motor vehicle ad valorem property tax account. This provision shall not apply to transactions involving licensed Kentucky motor vehicle dealers.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 128, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 113, sec. 8, effective December 31, 1988. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 26, effective July 15, 1982.
